name: Lil Death (GhostBomb)
description:
CONTROLLER IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Mama Death's little flower is finally old enough to try to stop an underworld incursion on her own.  Help her harvest souls and rack up huge combos!

Controls:

Left Stick - Move - Aim Attacks

A - Jump - Double Jump

X  - Scythe Attack

Y - Vaulting Grasp Attack

Controls (Keyboard):

Arrow Keys - Move - Aim Attacks

Z - Jump - Double Jump

X  - Scythe Attack

C - Vaulting Grasp Attack
